name: YahooCurrencyApiWrapper
summary: YahooCurrencyApiWrapper is a easy API Wrapper from the Yahoo Currency API. Help to retrieve data easily
description:
This pods will help you to use the YahooCurrencyApi without bothering you about how we manage the API Call. 
Just request and get the result.

This Cocoa Pods give you : 

	* Currency rates from Yahoo Currency API
	* A historical rates for a currency from the past days (the base comparaison is US Dollars)
